verses.text: \w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \nd \+w God|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd* \w showed|strong="H7200"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w*: \w he|strong="H3541"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* \w forming|strong="H3335"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* swarm \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w locusts|strong="H1462"\w*, \w when|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* late \w spring|strong="H5927"\w* grass \w began|strong="H8462"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w after|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s share \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w been|strong="H5927"\w* harvested.

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w finished|strong="H3615"\w* devouring \w all|strong="H6996"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* land’s \w vegetation|strong="H6212"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* said: ‘\w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \nd \+w God|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*, \w forgive|strong="H5545"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w beg|strong="H4994"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*! \w How|strong="H3588"\w* \w can|strong="H4310"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w survive|strong="H6965"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w so|strong="H1961"\w* helpless?’

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w relented|strong="H5162"\w*. \w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w happen|strong="H1961"\w*,’ said \w the|strong="H5921"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*. A Vision of Fire

\w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w he|strong="H7121"\w* \w showed|strong="H7200"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w*: \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \nd \+w God|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd* \w was|strong="H7227"\w* giving command \w to|strong="H7200"\w* execute judgment \w by|strong="H7121"\w* fire. \w It|strong="H7121"\w* burned \w up|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w deep|strong="H8415"\w*, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* had begun \w to|strong="H7200"\w* devour \w the|strong="H7200"\w* fields, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w said|strong="H7121"\w*:

‘\w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \nd \+w God|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*, forgive, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w beg|strong="H4994"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*! \w How|strong="H3588"\w* \w can|strong="H4310"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w survive|strong="H6965"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w so|strong="H6965"\w* helpless?’

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w relented|strong="H5162"\w*. ‘\w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w happen|strong="H1961"\w* \w either|strong="H1571"\w*,’ said \w the|strong="H5921"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*. A Vision of a Plumb Line

\w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Lord \nd \+w God|strong="H3027"\+w*\nd* \w showed|strong="H7200"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w*: \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Lord \w was|strong="H3027"\w* \w standing|strong="H5324"\w* \w beside|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* built \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* plumb line, \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* plumb line \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* said \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w*, ‘\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H7760"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w*, \w Amos|strong="H5986"\w*?’ \w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* answered, ‘\w A|strong="H3068"\w* plumb line,’ \w Then|strong="H3254"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* said, ‘\w Watch|strong="H7200"\w*: \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* setting \w a|strong="H3068"\w* plumb line \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w longer|strong="H5750"\w* \w overlook|strong="H5674"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* crookedness.

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w high|strong="H1116"\w* \w places|strong="H1116"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Isaac|strong="H3446"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H3478"\w* \w desolate|strong="H8074"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sanctuaries|strong="H4720"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H3478"\w* \w laid|strong="H8074"\w* \w waste|strong="H2717"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w rise|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.’ Amaziah and Amos

\w Then|strong="H7971"\w* Amaziah, \w chief|strong="H3478"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Bethel|strong="H1008"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w this|strong="H1697"\w* \w message|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: ‘\w Amos|strong="H5986"\w* \w has|strong="H3478"\w* \w conspired|strong="H7194"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w right|strong="H3478"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w heart|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. \w The|strong="H3605"\w* country \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w survive|strong="H3557"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*.

\w Amos|strong="H5986"\w* \w has|strong="H3478"\w* said, “\w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w led|strong="H1540"\w* \w away|strong="H1540"\w* \w captive|strong="H1540"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* land.”’

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* Amaziah said \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w Amos|strong="H5986"\w*, ‘Leave, \w you|strong="H3212"\w* \w who|strong="H3063"\w* \w see|strong="H2374"\w* visions, \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H8033"\w* land \w of|strong="H3899"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*. Earn \w your|strong="H8033"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*,

\w but|strong="H3588"\w* don’t \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* \w any|strong="H5750"\w* \w more|strong="H3254"\w* \w at|strong="H1004"\w* \w Bethel|strong="H1008"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w royal|strong="H4428"\w* \w residence|strong="H1004"\w*.’

‘\w I|strong="H3588"\w* am \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*,’ \w Amos|strong="H5986"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* Amaziah, ‘\w nor|strong="H3808"\w* trained \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w*. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am \w a|strong="H3068"\w* shepherd \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* keeper \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w sycamores|strong="H8256"\w* fig \w trees|strong="H8256"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w me|strong="H3947"\w* \w away|strong="H3947"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w following|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* said \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w me|strong="H3947"\w*, “\w Go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.”

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w therefore|strong="H5921"\w* \w listen|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*’s \w message|strong="H1697"\w*: “\w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w say|strong="H1697"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w preach|strong="H5197"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Isaac|strong="H3446"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* wife \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w become|strong="H2181"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w prostitute|strong="H2181"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, \w your|strong="H3068"\w* land \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w divided|strong="H2505"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w*, \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* soil, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w led|strong="H1540"\w* \w away|strong="H1540"\w* \w captive|strong="H1540"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* land.”’
